title: [PS3] El Chavo Kart
description:
* Your favorite El Chavo characters return, now with expert driving skills in this thrilling adventure.
* The game includes the original voices from the animated series, both in Spanish and Portuguese.
* The game features 12 playable characters, 8 Cups, 10 tracks, and 7 game modes.
* The soundtrack contains 11 originally composed songs by Daniel and GermÃƒÂ¡n from the Mexican rock band La Gusana Ciega.
* Available for Xbox 360 and Playstation 3.

El Chavo Kart is a kart racing game for up to 4 players in which you can go head-to-head with your friends and family. It contains several game modes including the classic Exhibition race and special modes like Survival. Choose from your favorite characters such as El Chavo, Quico, Popis, Don RamÃƒÂ³n or Sr. Barriga and start competing. There are 10 original race tracks inspired by the animated series for you to discover. Take your kart out for a race in Chavoltepec, Acapulco and Tangamandapio, or take it all the way to Brazil and into space! Learn to use distinct power-ups that knock your enemies out of first place. The items available include the classic Ham Sandwich, a Newspaper, a Bowling Ball, a Buzzer, a PiÃƒÂ±ata, a rocket, a beach ball, a Paper Airplane, a Pillow, and a Spicy Pepper for increased speed during the race. Gameplay: El Chavo Kart incorporates elements of the beloved El ChavoÃ‚Â® animated series. The racing game includes a total of 12 characters. Try playing the Exhibition mode to against the CPU or your friends and family and spend hours of fun exploring the challenging race circuits. In the Cup mode you will be able to unlock up to 8 different racing series which share 10 different circuits. Your main objective is to stay in first place in each and every race. When the Cup is complete and the sum of all your scores is above your competition, you will be awarded with the Golden Trophies. If you prefer putting your skills to the test, you can enter the Challenges section to polish your driving abilities and demonstrate why you are the best. With 3 game difficulties, you can increase your driving level until you feel you are ready to challenge your friends in Multiplayer mode. El Chavo Kart is an experience for the whole family. The game offers El ChavoÃ‚Â® fans a new way to enjoy themselves and interact with their favorite characters while staying true to the spirit of the TV show we all know and love so much.
